tool_description: An API showing the latest NFT news from most famous finance websites and most famous NFT websites.
name: NFT last news
title: NFT last news

api_list.name: Get individual news from source
api_list.description:
Gets news about NFT from a specific news resource.

/news/theblockcrypto

/news/theverge

/news/cryptonewsz

/news/techstory

/news/cointelegraph

/news/coinpedia

/news/dailymail

/news/cryptonews

/news/ndtv

/news/marketwatch
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nft-last-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/cointelegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nft-last-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all last NFT news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back last NFT news from most famous finance websites and most famous NFT websites.
